entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Speaking of doing nothing-what are you doing about the surge in COVID-19 cases (by the way, the 19 stands for the year it first appeared, genius), the racial divide in our county, and the killing of our soldiers with Russia’s blessing.  Talk about do nothing!!!!!!!
